1:
When we travel toward Jerusalem,\q2 I look up toward the hills and I ask myself, "Who will help me?"
\q1
2:
My answer is that Yahweh is the one who helps me;\q2 he is the one who made heaven and the earth.



\q1
3:
He will not allow us to fall;\q2 God, who protects us, will not fall asleep.
\q1
4:
The one who protects us Israelite people\q2 never gets sleepy or sleeps.



\q1
5:
Yahweh watches over us;\q2 he is like the shade that protects us from the sun.
\q1
6:
He will not allow the sun to harm us during the day,\q2 and he will not allow the moon to harm us during the night.



\q1
7:
Yahweh will protect us from being harmed in any manner;\q2 he will keep us safe.
\q1
8: He will protect us from the time that we leave our houses in the morning until we return in the evening;\q2 he will protect us now and he will protect us forever.
